Binary: clevis, clevis-tpm2, clevis-dracut, clevis-initramfs, clevis-luks, clevis-systemd, clevis-udisks2
Build-Depends: debhelper-compat (= 13), asciidoctor, bash-completion, cryptsetup-bin, curl, dracut-core, initramfs-tools, jose, jq, libaudit-dev, libglib2.0-dev, libjansson4, libjose-dev, libluksmeta-dev, libpwquality-tools, libssl-dev, libudisks2-dev, meson, pkgconf, systemd-dev, tang, tpm2-tools
Package-List: clevis deb net optional arch=linux-any clevis-dracut deb net optional arch=linux-any clevis-initramfs deb net optional arch=linux-any clevis-luks deb net optional arch=linux-any clevis-systemd deb net optional arch=linux-any clevis-tpm2 deb net optional arch=linux-any clevis-udisks2 deb net optional arch=linux-any
Testsuite-Triggers: cryptsetup, jose, jq, moreutils, openssl, socat, systemd, tang
